title: Duties of precinct officials
context: ยง11-75 Duties of precinct officials. The duties of the precinct officials shall vary with the voting system in use in the precinct. The duties for the particular system shall be assigned by the chief election officer by regulations adopted for such purpose. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; am L 1973, c 217, ยง1(x)]
